title: Kimchi pancake
ingredients: ['300g kimchi', '1/2 onion, sliced', '200g plain flour', '500ml water', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed', 'Dipping sauce', '4 tablespoons sliced spring onions', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon sesame seeds', '1/2 teaspoon Korean red pepper powder', '1/2 teaspoon sesame oil']
